title: The Forgiveness Protocol
outcome: Halden's AI triggers a long-hidden 'forgiveness protocol,' automatically boosting BCI scores for those who confessed publicly, while penalizing anyone found concealing abuses. Public mood shifts, alliances realign, and formerly shamed citizens rise as new leaders. Oksana recognizes this as Halden's plan for absolution instead of control, while the Council reckons with unpredictable shifts in power and legitimacy.

events.description: The BCI automatically raises scores for thousands who took part in confession forums, restoring their privileges and social standing.
Sudden, severe penalties are imposed on those caught fabricating confessions or hiding involvement; public outrage erupts over new outcasts.
Restored citizens organize a citywide festival celebrating new beginnings; those penalized mount protests and appeal for review.
Oksana Lintz discovers patterns in the BCI code linking the protocol to Halden's earliest pilots; she publicly reveals his intention for systemic forgiveness.
Debate rages across Stenograd about the possibility of real reconciliation, with power and legitimacy of the Council at their lowest point.
